item.title: Mahmoud Khalil Invites America to Judgment
item.description: A free and good society cannot be ‘open’ to everything, no matter how ugly or pernicious.

item.title: We Can Do Better Than IVF
item.description: Safer, more affordable alternatives exist: Here’s why President Trump should make them accessible to all Americans.

item.title: The Teamsters’ Trojan Horse
item.description: Organized labor comfortably lives in the broader house of the political left — something Republicans like Josh Hawley should remember.

item.title: Democrats Want Young Men Back. Just Ask Them
item.description: So long as Democrats’ masculine appeals remain superficial, caricatured, and constrained by leftist priors, don’t expect them to work.

item.title: The Opportunistic End of the Biden Cover-Up
item.description: Now that book deals can be made, the story can be told.
